featured_projects.name: Full-Stack Shop
featured_projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce web application built with React, Redux Toolkit, Node.js, Express, and Supabase, featuring a modern product catalogue, shopping cart, JWT authentication, Stripe checkout integration, and MetaMask wallet support.

featured_projects.name: Shopify Promo Image Manager
featured_projects.description: A Python CLI tool for automating promotional image overlays on Shopify product catalogs. Dynamically calculates discount percentages, applies seasonal graphics, and manages campaign lifecycles.

featured_projects.name: Freelancer AI Dashboard
featured_projects.description: AI-powered tool that gets the latest job offers from freelancer.com, rates and summarizes them, details risks and opportunities, and writes tailored bids.

featured_projects.name: Price Comparison Scraping Backend
featured_projects.description: Prototype backend for a price comparison portal using Python, FastAPI, and a scraping layer for multiple shops.

featured_projects.name: German Address Verification Service
featured_projects.description: Production-ready FastAPI service for German address verification, phonetic matching, and geocoding backed by PostgreSQL and PostGIS.

featured_projects.name: Mobile Benefits Dashboard
featured_projects.description: Member benefits dashboard prototype built with React Native and Expo, including an HTML admin console with Chart.js analytics.

testimonials.text: Working with Nils was a game-changer for us. We faced a significant accounting issue within our Odoo installation. Nils not only understood the complexities but also provided a tailored solution. His expertise and dedication were evident throughout.

Our experience with Nils has been exceptional. He provided comprehensive support for our Odoo implementation from day one, meticulously handling setup and configuration. His staff training sessions empowered our team to navigate the new system confidently.
